param.name: pHdr
param.para: Pointer to a structure that identifies the property to load. This structure contains the same data as the structure passed to .

param.name: ppStream
param.para: Pointer to an IStream interface pointer that receives the stream object.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: One or more parameters are invalid.

remarks.para: Only property data is written to the stream. The header data is not written to the stream.
Obtain the original position of the stream before writing to the stream. The original position should be restored in the stream before returning from this method.

summary.para: The ITfPersistentPropertyLoaderACP interface is implemented by an application and used by the TSF manager to load properties asynchronously. An application passes an instance of this interface when calling . When properties are loaded by a call to ITextStoreACPServices.Unserialize , this interface is used to load properties when required rather than all at once.
